name: Car Drive X-pert
description:
Car Drive X-pert - get the thrill and challenge of high speed rally racing cars. Test your driving skills and feel the adrenaline of being behind the wheel with lots of horsepower.

Your car - your rules. Upgrade it, install new parts and create your unique style.

Customization: Customize your cars with different paint colors, apply distinguishing marks, and personalize your car.

Cars: High performance rally cars, each with different specs.

Upgrades: Improve your cars with climbs for speed and performance.

Controls: Tilt or tap to steer. Manual or automatic acceleration.

Locations: Choose from 3 colorful maps and from 3 different road modes.
